subject: Leather steering wheel dimension
description_text:
Hi, question about this wheel: Simsonn Leather Steering Wheel – Precision and Luxury Combined – SIMSONN<https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-leather-steering-wheel>

I have seen many wheels on for example AliExpress where the dimensions say "13 inch, 320 mm". Now that's an error because 13 inches is actually 330 mm.
320 mm is actually 12.6 inches.

So with that in mind I was wondering what the diameter on your wheel is in mm? Is it in fact 330 mm, or is it actually 320 mm?


Best regards,
Trygve

conversations.body_text: Hi Trygve Thom,    Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We acknowledge that our information contained an error. The correct dimensions for this steering wheel are 13 inches (330 mm).
